resources.string: At OverEasy, we take our comfort food seriously. So seriously we did it twice. Tasty shakes. Bangin’ burgers. Good ol’ Mac and Cheeks. Served alongside a healthy dose of nostalgia, we love messing with the classics and kicking things up a notch. Familiar but never boring. We’re your irreverent younger sibling. A friend for the good times and bad. Who said love always has to hurt? Get ready because we’re about to shake your buns.
